System.Title.newValue: [Supporting the platform - M365 Compliance - Viewing an Assessment]: Two -dimensional scrolling (Horizontal and Vertical) is observed in "Viewing an Assessment" page when zoom to 400%.

System.Description.newValue:
User Experience:

Visually impaired users are getting impacted as it is difficult to scroll in two-dimensional. 

Test Environment:

OS : Windows 10
Version: 2004(OS Build 19588.1000)
Browser : Anaheim Dev (Version 85.0.552.1 (Official build) dev (64-bit))
URL: https://df.compliance.microsoft.com/compliancescore?viewid=Assessments&flight=EnableComplianceScoreADO,EnableComplianceScoreADC,EnableComplianceScoreAM

Repro Steps:
Step 1: Open Anaheim Dev browser.
Step 2: Enter URL : https://compliance.microsoft.com/auditlogsearch
Step 3: Now "Microsoft Compliance Score (preview)" page will be displayed.
Step 4: Navigate to Assessments tab and activate it.
Step 5: Navigate to "Adding a new Assessment" button and activate it using keyboard.
Step 6: Create an Assessment here For eg: 'Hello' and click on ;create assessment' button within the 'Review and finish' page.
Step 7: 'Hello' assessment page will get open.
Step 8: Observe the issue.

Actual:
Two -dimensional scrolling (Horizontal and Vertical) is observed in "Viewing an Assessment" page when zoom to 400%.

Expected Result: 
Horizontal scrolling should not available in "Viewing an Assessment" page when zoom to 400%.

MAS Reference:

MAS1.4.10

https://microsoft.sharepoint.com/teams/msenable/_layouts/15/Doc.aspx?sourcedoc=%7BE12828DF-B35C-4F4D-9289-1F932E19F8CF%7D&file=MAS%201.4.10%20%E2%80%93%20Reflow.docx&action=default&mobileredirect=true&cid=5488f398-d97c-4915-9921-2e870e860e53

System.Tags.newValue: A11yFeature; A11yMAS; A11yMediumImpact; A11yWCAG2.1; Accessibility; Compliance; ComplianceScore; HCL-E+D; HCL-M365-S&CC; M365SCC; MAS1.4.10

System.History.newValue:
2D scrolling is mainly because of "Delete Assessment" button overflowing and Workbench overflowing.
Delete assessment overflow fix is done.
For Workbench, we are using SCC "Workbench" Component

System.History.newValue:
AssessmentDrilldown.tsx
IWorkbenchView from "@m365scc/page-templates"

System.History.oldValue:
AssessmentDrilldown.tsx
IWorkbenchView from "@m365scc/page-templates"
System.History.newValue: Since this bug is SCC bug, I change area path to 'IP Engineering\Security and Compliance Center' and unassigned.

This is a Fabric/Fluent UI bug with the Pivot control, since it has no reflow behavior. Please file the bug to them. Our SCC pivots, used in beta version of workbench page template, do have reflow. You can try it here: M365 SCC Page Templates Demo Page (page-templates.azurewebsites.net). To get the benefit of this beta workbench page, FT can opt in to the new template. Please reach out to m365sccengdisc@microsoft.com for details on how to opt-in, or join us at SCC office hours

You can see that Fabric Pivot has no reflow in their demo: Home - Fluent UI (microsoft.com)
